services: Broward County + nationwide pickup via insured transport

content.about: Koosh Jewelers provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Estate jewelry. With 30+ experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the Fort Lauderdale area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Jessica D.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and Koosh Jewelers delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.author: Nancy A.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: Nancy B.
reviews.content: Koosh Jewelers's knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation Koosh Jewelers provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.
